{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16776v1", "title": "Building sets, Chow rings, and their Hilbert series", "summary": "We establish formulas for the Hilbert series of the Feichtner--Yuzvinsky Chow
ring of a polymatroid using arbitrary building sets. For braid matroids and
minimal building sets, our results produce new formulas for the Poincar\'e
polynomial of the moduli space $\overline{\mathcal{M}}_{0,n+1}$ of pointed
stable rational curves, and recover several previous results by Keel, Getzler,
Manin, and Aluffi--Marcolli--Nascimento. We also use our methods to produce
examples of matroids and building sets for which the corresponding Chow ring
has Hilbert series with non-log-concave coefficients. This contrasts with the
real-rootedness and log-concavity conjectures of Ferroni--Schr\"oter for
matroids with maximal building sets, and of Aluffi--Chen--Marcolli for braid
matroids with minimal building sets.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-23T14:49:10Z"}
